title: Deshaun Watson on His Time at Clemson and Being a Player-Activist | The Bakari Sellers Podcast
description:
Bakari Sellers, host of ‘The Bakari Sellers Podcast,’ is joined by Houston Texans quarterback Deshaun Watson to talk about his time playing at Clemson and the Black Lives Matter movement within the NFL.
Host: Bakari Sellers
Guest: Deshaun Watson
